app.title: EPCalculator v2 - Kikokotozi cha Uwezekano wa Hitilafu
app.tagline: Kikokotozi cha Uwezekano wa Hitilafu kwa Mifumo ya Upokezaji wa Kidijitali

params.title: Vigezo vya Uchunguzi
params.customConstellationHelp: Fafanua pointi zako za mkusanyiko na uwezekano maalum
params.fixErrors: Tafadhali rekebisha makosa hapo juu kabla ya kuhesabu.

results.title: Matokeo ya Uchunguzi
results.computingHint: Hii inaweza kuchukua muda kidogo kulingana na vigezo
results.errorProbabilityDesc: Uwezekano kwamba ishara iliyotumwa imepokelewa vibaya
results.errorExponentDesc: Kiwango cha kuoza kwa kielelezo cha uwezekano wa hitilafu na urefu wa msimbo
results.optimalRhoDesc: Thamani bora ya kigezo kutoka kwa mchakato wa kuboresha
results.noResultsHint: Sanidi vigezo vyako vya uchunguzi na ubofye "Hesabu Uwezekano wa Hitilafu" kuona matokeo hapa.
results.algorithmValue: Mipaka ya kielelezo cha hitilafu ya Gallager
results.optimizationValue: Kushuka kwa gradient na ukubwa wa hatua inayobadilika

simulation.title: Uchunguzi wa Uwezekano wa Hitilafu
simulation.description: Sanidi vigezo vya urekebishaji na hesabu mipaka ya uwezekano wa hitilafu kwa kutumia uchanganuzi wa nadharia ya taarifa.

plottingPanel.title: Uchoro wa Kuingiliana
plottingPanel.description: Tengeneza michoro ya kuingiliana ili kuonesha tabia ya uwezekano wa hitilafu katika anuwai za vigezo.
plottingPanel.generatingHint: Inahesabu pointi za data na kuunda uoneshaji
plottingPanel.noPlotsHint: Sanidi vigezo vyako vya uchoro na mipangilio ya uchunguzi, kisha ubofye "Tengeneza Uchoro" kuunda uoneshaji.

plotting.title: Vidhibiti vya Uchoro
plotting.mbNotAvailable: MB haiko wakati β iko kwenye mhimili wa X
plotting.mbDescription: Usambazaji wa Maxwell-Boltzmann: Q(x) ∝ exp(-β|x|²). Thamani za juu za β zinakusanya uwezekano kwenye alama za nishati ya chini (uundaji wa amplitude wa uwezekano).
plotting.affectsDistribution: Inaathiri usambazaji wa pointi na vitengo vya anuwai
plotting.fixErrors: Tafadhali rekebisha makosa hapo juu kabla ya kuchora.
plotting.importHelp: Pakia, weka kwa mkono, au bandika data kutoka Python, MATLAB, Excel, nk.
plotting.mergeOrNewDescription: Chati yenye mihimili sawa tayari ipo. Je, ungependa kuunganisha data mpya au kuunda takwimu tofauti?

constellation.title: Mkusanyiko Maalum
constellation.normalizeTooltip: Bofya ili kusawazisha mkusanyiko (uwezekano unajumlisha hadi 1, nishati ya wastani = 1)
constellation.vizCaption: Vuta pointi ili kuzihama. Weka juu kuona kuratibu.

dataImport.title: Leta Data
dataImport.dragDrop: Vuta na udondoshe faili hapa, au bofya kuchagua

validation.modulationPowerOf2: Urekebishaji lazima uwe nguvu ya 2 kati ya 2 na 512
validation.qamPerfectSquare: QAM inahitaji M kuwa mraba kamili (4, 16, 64, 256)
validation.customConstellationInvalid: Mkusanyiko maalum si halali (angalia jumla ya uwezekano na nishati)
validation.snrRange: SNR lazima iwe kati ya 0 na 1e20
validation.rateRange: Kiwango lazima kiwe kati ya 0 na 1e20
validation.codeLengthRange: Urefu wa msimbo lazima uwe kati ya 1 na 1000000
validation.quadratureRange: Quadrature lazima iwe kati ya 2 na 40
validation.thresholdRange: Kizingiti lazima kiwe kati ya 1e-15 na 0.1
validation.xRangeInvalid: Anuwai ya X lazima iwe na thamani mbili na chini < juu
validation.pointsRange: Pointi lazima ziwe kati ya 1 na 101
validation.x2RangeInvalid: Anuwai ya X2 lazima iwe na thamani mbili na chini < juu
validation.x2PointsRange: Pointi za X2 lazima ziwe kati ya 1 na 101

plotItem.incompatibleAxes: Michoro iliyochaguliwa ina mihimili isiyolingana (X1 na X2 lazima zilingane)
plotItem.allAxesMustMatch: Michoro yote iliyochaguliwa lazima iwe na mihimili inayolingana (X1, X2, na Z)
plotItem.toggleLogX: Badilisha mizani ya logarithm ya mhimili wa X
plotItem.toggleLogY: Badilisha mizani ya logarithm ya mhimili wa Y
plotItem.toggleLogX1: Badilisha mizani ya logarithm ya mhimili wa X1
plotItem.toggleLogX2: Badilisha mizani ya logarithm ya mhimili wa X2
plotItem.toggleLogZ: Badilisha mizani ya logarithm ya mhimili wa Z

footer.title: EPCalculator v2
footer.description: Utekelezaji wa kisasa wa mahesabu ya uwezekano wa hitilafu kwa mifumo ya upokezaji wa kidijitali.
footer.featureModulation: Msaada wa urekebishaji wa PAM, PSK, QAM
footer.techGallager: Mipaka ya kielelezo cha hitilafu ya Gallager
footer.copyright: EPCalculator. Imejengwa na teknolojia za kisasa za wavuti.

tutorial.welcomeSubtitle: Error Probability Calculator for Digital Communications
tutorial.singlePointDesc: Compute error probability for specific parameter values. Set modulation, SNR, and code rate to get instant results.
tutorial.plottingDesc: Generate interactive plots to explore how error probability changes across parameter ranges. Compare different configurations visually.
tutorial.pressEscHint: Press Enter or Esc to continue
tutorial.stepAxisScalesDesc: Each axis can be Linear or Logarithmic. For SNR axes, toggle between dB and linear units. The button shows the state it will switch to when clicked.
tutorial.stepTransposeDesc: Swap the X and Y axes to view the data from a different perspective.
tutorial.stepExportDesc: Export your plot as PNG, SVG for images, or CSV for raw data analysis.
tutorial.stepRemoveDesc: Remove this plot from your workspace. You can always generate it again.
tutorial.stepContourComparisonDesc: Select multiple contour plots using the checkboxes to compare them. Use Comparison to show differences between two plots, or Benchmark to overlay multiple 3D surfaces.
tutorial.stepConstellationDesc: Drag points to move them. Hover to see coordinates.
tutorial.stepConstellationTableDesc: Edit point coordinates and probabilities precisely.
tutorial.stepConstellationLuckyDesc: Generate a random constellation with 2-16 points. The constellation is automatically normalized to have unit energy and probabilities summing to 1.
tutorial.stepConstellationHideTableDesc: Show or hide the points table to focus on the visual editor or get more precise control over point values.
